featured.text: In this movie, Leonardo DiCaprio played both King Louis XIV and his twin brother Philippe.

definition.zh_def: 路易斯，常見的男性名字，源自法語，意為“著名的戰士”。
definition.en_def: Louis is a common male given name of French origin, meaning 'famous warrior.'
definition.example: Louis is planning to visit Paris next summer.
